entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
